com.codisimus.plugins.turnstile

Class TurnstileSign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.turnstile.TurnstileSign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class TurnstileSign
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    A TurnstileSign is a Sign that is linked to a Turnstile There is a value on a specific line which must stay updated

    • Field Summary

      int line 
      org.bukkit.block.Sign sign 
      Turnstile turnstile

      Constructs a new TurnstileSign with the given data

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears each line of the Sign Should only be used before unlinking the Sign
      void incrementCounter()
      Increments the Player count displayed on the Sign by one If the Sign displays the money earned, increment by the price
      void incrementEarned()
      Increments the amount of money earned that is displayed on the Sign
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serialize() 
      org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask tickListenerTask()
      Updates the Turnstile Sign when it becomes either locked, free, or open
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the String representation of this TurnstileSign The format of the returned String is as follows TurnstileName'x'y'z'line
